channel.title: Impulse [637/639]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://impulsepk.org/images/IPK2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.malayaly.xtgem.com/images/Site%20image/icon_small_home.gif[/img][url=http://impulsepk.org/]http://impulsepk.org/[/url] [IMG]http://www.softrak.com/images/forum_ico.png[/img]http://impulsepk.org/forums/forum.php/ [IMG]http://www.digistylers.com/images/tick_icon.png[/img]http://impulsepk.org/vote/ [IMG]http://www.rogercpareview.com/media/images/layout/play-iconB2_small.png[/img]http://impulsepk.org/webclient/ [IMG]http://iconizer.net/files/Splashyfish/orig/document_small_download.png[/img]http://impulsepk.org/download/
[SIZE=5]ImpulsePK is a Dementhium 637 loading 639 based server situated around the 2011 era of PvP & Bounty hunter worlds.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Projects : [/SIZE][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653988.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653988.0.html[/url]
[shadow=blue,left][size=12pt][u][b]NEW Promotional video[/b][/u][/size][/shadow]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpXEJCj6ymA&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[B][SIZE=5][U][I]Server Features[/I][/U][/SIZE][/B] [FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]City pvp all around and banks as safezones [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Full wilderness with correct multi-areas, dungeons with the npcs [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]AStarPathFinder algorithm used. Strong stability [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Damage soaking, poisoning, deflecting & correct damage multipliers [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Flawless switching & hybridding [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Hybridding delays corrected and improved upon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Earned potential system and artifact drops according to this [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Artifacts sold for pvp tokens [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Improved combat formulaes [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Bug free [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Perfected pvp safezone timer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]All attack & defence animations correctly added for each weapon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Advanced commands to set yell colour, yell tag, display name, vote, forums [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Players show ontop of familiars for better hybridding [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Diagonal combat corrected [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Full combat clipping & combat following methods for range, mage & melee [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Summoning a variety of familiars [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Titles done in the client, some titles are before your name and some are after [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OuVHfUT.png?1?8448[/img]Custom donator crowns for donators
These features could keep going:) [/FONT]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/5EmN1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5EmNV.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5EkCu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5EkOw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5El0C.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5Ellq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5ElGh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/5aJho.jpg[/img]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][B][U][I]Credits & Thanks[/I][/U][/B] - Dementhium team - Sixpack & Orel - Wildking72 aka Wildskiller - AeroPK[/FONT] [/center]

item.title: Impulse [637/639]
item.dc:creator: @Magnitoo Magnitoo
item.description:
@Magnitoo wrote:

[center]

http://impulsepk.org/
http://impulsepk.org/forums/forum.php/
http://impulsepk.org/vote/
http://impulsepk.org/webclient/
http://impulsepk.org/download/

[SIZE=5]ImpulsePK is a Dementhium 637 loading 639 based server situated around the 2011 era of PvP & Bounty hunter worlds.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Projects : [/SIZE]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653988.0.html

[shadow=blue,left][size=12pt]NEW Promotional video[/size][/shadow]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpXEJCj6ymA&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

[B][SIZE=5][U][I]Server Features[/I][/U][/SIZE][/B]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]City pvp all around and banks as safezones
Full wilderness with correct multi-areas, dungeons with the npcs
AStarPathFinder algorithm used. Strong stability
Damage soaking, poisoning, deflecting & correct damage multipliers
Flawless switching & hybridding
Hybridding delays corrected and improved upon
Earned potential system and artifact drops according to this
Artifacts sold for pvp tokens
Improved combat formulaes
Bug free
Perfected pvp safezone timer
All attack & defence animations correctly added for each weapon
Advanced commands to set yell colour, yell tag, display name, vote, forums
Players show ontop of familiars for better hybridding
Diagonal combat corrected
Full combat clipping & combat following methods for range, mage & melee
Summoning a variety of familiars
Titles done in the client, some titles are before your name and some are after
Custom donator crowns for donators

These features could keep going:)
[/FONT]








[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][B][U][I]Credits & Thanks[/I][/U][/B]

  • Dementhium team
  • Sixpack & Orel
  • Wildking72 aka Wildskiller
  • AeroPK[/FONT]
    [/center]

Read full topic
